hero_insight.statement: Your educational tutorials are crushing it—they get 3x more saves than personal stories
hero_insight.why_it_matters: Saves are the strongest signal of value on Instagram. Your audience is actively bookmarking your educational content to reference later, which means they see it as genuinely useful. This is exactly the behavior that drives algorithmic reach and builds authority.

top_example.why_it_worked: Clear, actionable framework with immediate application

expandable_details.pattern_explanation: Posts with step-by-step frameworks, numbered lists, or clear takeaways consistently outperform inspirational or personal content
expandable_details.what_to_do: Double down on tutorial-style content with actionable frameworks

snapshot_cards.title: Behind the scenes
snapshot_cards.insight: Personal content gets likes but fewer saves—consider adding actionable takeaway

snapshot_cards.title: Carousel format wins
snapshot_cards.description: Your carousel posts have 2.5x higher save rate than single images
snapshot_cards.data_point: 12 carousels, avg 52 saves vs 21 saves for single images

snapshot_cards.title: Underutilizing Reels
snapshot_cards.description: Only 10 Reels posted, but they show strong engagement potential
snapshot_cards.suggestion: Increase Reel frequency to 2-3 per week

content_analysis.performance_summary: Strong educational content performance with opportunity to optimize format mix

opportunities.suggestion: Increase Reel frequency to 2-3 per week

opportunities.opportunity: Not posting during peak evening hours
opportunities.suggestion: Schedule more content for 6-8 PM time slot

recommendations: Add actionable takeaways to personal stories

idea_cards.title: 5 Productivity Myths Sabotaging Your Day
idea_cards.hook: Stop following advice that doesn't work. Here's what actually matters.
idea_cards.why_it_works: Contrarian angle creates curiosity, educational format aligns with top-performing content

idea_cards.title: The 3-Hour Focus Framework
idea_cards.hook: I tried 12 focus methods. Only this one worked.
idea_cards.why_it_works: Personal proof builds trust, framework format is highly saveable

immediate_actions: Set a new contrail focused on educational carousels
Schedule content for peak engagement hours
long_term_strategy: Build content library of tutorial-style frameworks
Track save rate as primary success metric
